titleStmt.title: Herodian of Alexandria his Historie of tvventy Roman Cæsars and emperors (of his time.) Together with the most solemne deification of the Roman emperors and empresses. Interpreted out of the Greeke originall.
History. English
titleStmt.author: Herodian.
Maxwell, James, b. 1581.
I. M., fl. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for Henry Taunton, and are to bee sold at his shop in St Dunstons Churchyard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end by translator: I.M., i.e. James Maxwell?.
With an additional title page, engraved: Herodian's imperiall history.
Running title reads: Herodian's imperiall historie.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in St Dunstons Churchyard in Fleetstreet
